title: Implement CodexEntry class
description: Create a CodexEntry class with id, title, text, and unlocked fields. Store/load entries in codex.json.

title: Add Codex UI to pause/menu
description: Add a basic UI to show unlocked Codex entries. Should support scrolling and reading long text.

title: Update GlyphTabletItem to unlock Codex entries
description: When player picks up a GlyphTabletItem, unlock a corresponding Codex entry (can contain encoded/glyph content).

title: Add VaultLogItem interaction
description: When a VaultLogItem is picked up, unlock a codex log or show terminal-style message.

title: Write 5 sample Codex entries
description: Include background lore: vault system, Architect hints, old drone missions.

title: Display Architect integrity on CoreFragmentItem pickup
description: Show message like 'Fragment integrity 34%' when core fragment is collected.

title: Trigger Architect messages after puzzles
description: After key puzzles (e.g., RingPuzzle), flash a cryptic Architect message.

title: Modify RingPuzzle visuals with glyphs
description: Add glowing glyphs or visual changes to RingPuzzle to reflect increasing Architect presence.

title: Add TerminalMessage system
description: Create a system to show brief messages or dialogues via terminals or HUD overlays.

title: Design 3 Major Vault Zones
description: Create 3 key vault stages, each with unique layout, puzzle, guardian/boss, and core fragment.

title: Track vault completions
description: Track which vaults have been completed and store progress in save file or session.

title: Trigger mid-game Architect reveal
description: After all 3 vaults are complete, trigger a cutscene or message introducing the Architect fully.

title: Visual/audio theme shift after mid-game
description: Change lighting, color schemes, or background music to show Architect's growing influence.

title: Create Endgame Vault Scene
description: Unlock final vault after collecting all core fragments. This leads to the ending choice.

title: Build Ending Decision Point
description: Create a room with 3 consoles for choosing ending: Join Architect, Escape, or Shut Down.

title: Implement 3 distinct endings
description: Create logic and messages for the 3 possible outcomes based on player decision.

title: Save unlocked endings
description: Track which endings the player has reached and display on main menu or profile.

title: Add glyph decoding mini-game (Optional)
description: Add a mini-game that lets players gradually decode alien glyphs into readable text.

title: Add corrupted drone echoes (Optional)
description: Create echoes or logs from failed drones that appear in later vaults as environmental storytelling.

title: Add Architect Influence stat (Optional)
description: Track how much influence the Architect has on the player and use it to subtly alter gameplay/UI.
